Description: Limestone stela in the form of a pylon; undecorated cornice at the top; incised winged sun-disc on the lintel and Hieroglyphic text on the jambs; within are two registers; upper: figure before an offering-table adoring the enthroned figure of Osiris; lower: kneeling woman and four standing children before an incense-stand(?) and three vessels on a table.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995 Feb-May, Atlanta, Emory University, Reflections of Women in the New Kingdom
